Package gui

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as the (view and) controller for the GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void focusOnStanza​(int stanzaIndex)
      Updates the stanza information in the right-hand pane.
      void focusOnWord​(IndexedTokenLabel focusOnToken)
      Updates the word-level information in the right-hand pane (checkboxes, radio buttons, suggestions).
      IndexedTokenLabel getFocusedToken()
      Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
      IndexedTokenLabel getSecondFocusedToken()
      Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
      void getSuggestions()
      Gets the suggested substitutions for the focused token based on the search parameter checkboxes.
      void initialize()  
      void newPoem()
      Opens a dialogue for a user to choose a title name, and then switches the GUI to direct edit mode.
      void openPoem()
      Opens a dialogue for the user to select a source text file, then attempts to read a poem from said file, generate a poem model from its contents, and then tokenise said model and update the GUI.
      void savePoem()
      Attempts to write the current poem to a text file.
      void savePoemAs()
      Opens a dialogue for the user to choose the name of the text file to save the poem under.
      void setFocusedToken​(IndexedTokenLabel token)
      Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
      void setSecondFocusedToken​(IndexedTokenLabel token)
      Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
      void toggleDirectEdit()
      Swaps the left-hand pane between direct edit and token modes.
      void updateDefaultRhymeScheme​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Attempts to set the default rhyme scheme for the poem.
      void updateIncludeUnknowns​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Tied to the include unknowns checkbox in the FXML file.
      void updateIntendedRhymeScheme​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Attempts to set the intended rhyme scheme for the stanza that the focused token is within.
      void updatePartOfSpeech​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Tied to the PoS radio buttons within the FXML file.
      void updateSuggestionPool​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Tied to the suggestion pool checkboxes in the FXML file.

        Tied to the PoS radio buttons within the FXML file.

        Tied to the suggestion pool checkboxes in the FXML file.

        public void updateIncludeUnknowns​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

      • focusOnStanza

        public void focusOnStanza​(int stanzaIndex)
        Updates the stanza information in the right-hand pane. Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
        Parameters:
        stanzaIndex - zero-indexed.

      • focusOnWord

        public void focusOnWord​(IndexedTokenLabel focusOnToken)
        Updates the word-level information in the right-hand pane (checkboxes, radio buttons, suggestions). Public for use in IndexedTokenLabel
        Parameters:
        focusOnToken - typically focusedToken.

      • updateIntendedRhymeScheme

        public void updateIntendedRhymeScheme​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Attempts to set the intended rhyme scheme for the stanza that the focused token is within. Public for reference within the FXML file.
        Parameters:
        e - from txtfldIntRhymeScheme.

      • updateDefaultRhymeScheme

        public void updateDefaultRhymeScheme​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Attempts to set the default rhyme scheme for the poem. Public for reference within the FXML file.
        Parameters:
        e - from txtfldDefaultRhymeScheme.

      • getSuggestions

        public void getSuggestions()
        Gets the suggested substitutions for the focused token based on the search parameter checkboxes. Suggestion finding is done in a daemon thread, as it can be slow.

      • openPoem

        public void openPoem()
        Opens a dialogue for the user to select a source text file, then attempts to read a poem from said file, generate a poem model from its contents, and then tokenise said model and update the GUI.

      • savePoem

        public void savePoem()
        Attempts to write the current poem to a text file.

      • savePoemAs

        public void savePoemAs()
        Opens a dialogue for the user to choose the name of the text file to save the poem under.

      • newPoem

        public void newPoem()
        Opens a dialogue for a user to choose a title name, and then switches the GUI to direct edit mode.

      • toggleDirectEdit

        public void toggleDirectEdit()
        Swaps the left-hand pane between direct edit and token modes.
